query.statement: SELECT MANDT ,DOCNO ,DOCKIND ,APPGUBN ,SEQNO ,SEQSTAT ,APDPT1 ,APDPT1_N ,APNUM ,APRNK ,APDATE ,APTIM --,APDESC ,VALUE(CAST(APDESC AS VARCHAR(768)), '') AS APDESC ,'' AS APPGUBN2 FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 WHERE 1 = 1 AND MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND DOCNO = #DOCNO# -- AND SEQSTAT = '1' ORDER BY SEQNO DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY WITH UR
